DynamoRIO

_version_number_t Union Reference

#include <dr_modules.h>

Data Fields

uint64 version
 
struct {
} version_uint
 
struct {
} version_parts
 

Detailed Description

Used to hold .rsrc section version number information. This number is usually presented as p1.p2.p3.p4 by PE parsing tools.

Field Documentation

◆ version

uint64 _version_number_t::version

Representation as a 64-bit integer.

◆ version_parts

struct { ... } _version_number_t::version_parts

Representation as 4 16-bit integers.

◆ version_uint

struct { ... } _version_number_t::version_uint

Representation as 2 32-bit integers.
